name: Scary granny hospital escape
description: Welcome to the scary granny hospital escape! Do you have the courage to explore the dark hospital and meet the evil granny face to face? In this scary doll simulator, you are operating in a dark & haunted hospital. These creepy games consist of virtual granny nightmares in horror houses that will be a hell for you if you don’t escape. You will become more obsessed and closer to the haunted hospital while trying to escape this scary place. Brave enough to enter into the adventure of the horror game in a dark haunted house. If you are a horror game lover and you can solve different puzzles to escape the rooms, then you will definitely be enjoying this granny game.
